altTitles.en: I Became the Mother of the Villain

altTitles.zh: 某天我成了恶棍的继母

altTitles.th: คุณแม่มือใหม่ของจอมวายร้าย

altTitles.pt: Eu me tornei a mãe do vilão

altTitles.es: Me convertí en la madre de un villano

altTitles.ja: 悪党の母になりました

description.en:
I have become the mother of “Einspanner,” the antagonist of a novel. I was supposed to be the bad stepmother who abused him as a child and was killed by him when he became an adult. But, when I saw the cute look on his naive and chubby face… “No, he’s so cute. He’s so young that he looks like he’s still sucking on his tiny fingers! How could I ever hurt him?”

This child is so cute that I can’t believe that he would become a villain. And so, I’ve decided. I will protect him! This way, he will protect me too!

---
Summoned into her favorite novel as the infamous Duchess Roselia Chade, Haena is bathed in riches, power, and a family of her own. Life couldn’t be better, save for the small detail that her beloved stepson, Einspanner Chade, is also the evil mastermind destined to kill her. At this point in the story Ein is still just an adorable child yet to reach his cruel awakening, and so Roselia is determined to stop him from becoming a ruthless killer. But with the duke getting in her way and trying to poison his own son, safely raising a child that was primed for villainy may prove harder than she originally thought. The survival of both mother and child depends on whether Roselia can successfully rewrite their tragic ending!

---
**Original Novel:** [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/novel/detail.asp?serial_num=sf3776), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53608824), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/novel/E000090112), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=5962106), [OneStory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H042565207)

description.fr:
Haena est une jeune auxiliaire de crèche et mène une vie ordinaire. Le moment de la journée qu'elle préfère est celui où elle se plonge dans son roman préféré, le soir, avant de dormir. Mais un beau matin, lorsqu'elle ouvre les yeux, elle se retrouve plongée dans le monde du roman en question! Et qui plus est, dans le corps de Roselia Chade, la belle-mère du méchant ultime, Einspanner Chade! Cela dit, dans ce monde, Ein est encore enfant et ressemble à un ange, car il n'est pas encore devenu méchant. Haena, qui a conscience qu'Ein, dans le roman, a mal tourné à cause de sa belle-mère qui le maltraitait, et qu'il a fini par assassiner dans l'histoire, est bien décidée à changer le destin des personnages du livre. Elle élèvera Ein comme son propre enfant, et le comblera d'amour, afin qu'il ne devienne pas l'atroce méchant qui l'a assassinée. Mais elle doit également faire face à Carcius Chade, le mari de Roselia... Parviendra-t-elle à changer la destinée de Roselia et de sa famille?

---
**Original Novel:** [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/novel/detail.asp?serial_num=sf3776), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53608824), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/novel/E000090112), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=5962106), [OneStory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H042565207)

description.ko:
소설 속 최종 흑막이 될 예정인 '아인스페너'의 엄마로 빙의해 버렸다.
그것도 아이를 학대해서 죽임을 당하는 나쁜 새엄마로.

이 비극의 운명에서 도망칠 방법을 궁리하는데, 눈 앞에 보인 건 아무 것도 모른 채 순진 무구한 얼굴을 하고 있는 악당 유망주...?

'아니, 이 작고 오동통한 손가락마저 물고 빨고 싶을 만큼 귀여운 아이인데! 도대체 학대할 곳이 어디 있다고!'
그래서 나는 결심했다! 이 아이를 지켜주기로, 그러니까.. 다 크면 나도 좀 살려줘!

---
**Original Novel:** [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/novel/detail.asp?serial_num=sf3776), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53608824), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/novel/E000090112), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=5962106), [OneStory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H042565207)

description.tr:
Fark etmeden ve aniden, kitap serisinin ana kötü kahramanı olarak bilinen kötü adam Ain Spenner Cassius'un annesi oldum. Onu çocukken istismar eden ve böylece onun ellerinde bir ölümle karşılaşan korkunç bir üvey anneyim. Gelecekteki genç kötü adamı ve yüzündeki saf, masum ifadeyi gördüğümde trajik kaderimden kaçmak için bir plan düşünüyordum. Ancak… "Ne kadar sevimli bir çocuk! O kadar tatlı ki onu ısırmak istiyorum! Biri onu nasıl istismar edebilir?" O kadar tatlıydı ki, büyüdüğünde kötü biri olacağına inanamadım. Ben de onu korumaya karar verdim. Böylelikle büyüdüğünde o da beni kurtaracak.

---
**Original Novel:** [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/novel/detail.asp?serial_num=sf3776), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53608824), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/novel/E000090112), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=5962106), [OneStory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H042565207)
